original_title: Mga Bag-ong Nawong sang Damgo kag Katingalahan
overview: An exploration of how we use the masks as our new faces in these trying times. It shows a perspective of what life is like during the pandemic through poetry, metaphor, movements, and the use of painted masks.

production_companies.name: National Commission for Culture and the Arts

title: The New Faces of Dreams and Mysteries
